description: Allows the partners to associate a Microsoft Partner Network(MPN) ID to a user or service principal in the customer's Azure directory.

commands.name: az managementpartner create
commands.summary: Associates a Microsoft Partner Network(MPN) ID to the current authenticated user or service principal.

commands.name: az managementpartner delete
commands.summary: Delete the Microsoft Partner Network(MPN) ID of the current authenticated user or service principal.

commands.name: az managementpartner show
commands.summary: Gets the Microsoft Partner Network(MPN) ID of the current authenticated user or service principal.

commands.name: az managementpartner update
commands.summary: Updates the Microsoft Partner Network(MPN) ID of the current authenticated user or service principal.
